trans-unit.source: Represents a plug-in that can be added to a control's <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusPlugIns*> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa um plug-in que podem ser adicionados a um controlo <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusPlugIns*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusPlugIns*>

trans-unit.source: The StylusPlugIn allows you to manipulate <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects on separate threads.
trans-unit.target: O StylusPlugIn permite-lhe manipular <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>objetos em separado threads.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: Separate threads are used so that the ink still renders as the tablet pen inputs data even if the application is doing something else.
trans-unit.target: Threads separados são utilizados para que o tinta digital ainda é apresentada como os dados de entradas de caneta tablet, mesmo se a aplicação está a fazer outra coisa.

trans-unit.source: To intercept stylus points from the hardware, create a class that inherits from the StylusPlugIn class.
trans-unit.target: Para intercetar pontos de caneta do hardware, crie uma classe que herda da classe de StylusPlugIn.

trans-unit.source: The StylusPlugIn class has the following methods that you can override to manipulate <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects on a thread in the pen thread pool.
trans-unit.target: A classe de StylusPlugIn tem os seguintes métodos que pode substituir manipular <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>conjunto de threads de objetos num thread de caneta.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusEnter%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusLeave%2A> The pen's input is routed to an element's StylusPlugIn on the pen thread.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusEnter%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusLeave%2A>a caneta de entrada é encaminhado para StylusPlugIn um elemento no thread de caneta.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusLeave%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusEnter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: Since accurate hit-testing cannot be performed on the pen thread, some elements might occasionally receive stylus input intended for other elements.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez que preciso acessos-teste não é possível efetuar o thread de caneta, alguns elementos ocasionalmente, poderão receber se destina a outros elementos a entrada de caneta.

trans-unit.source: If you need to make sure the input was routed correctly before performing an operation, subscribe to and perform the operation in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDownProcessed%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se precisar de certificar-se de que a entrada foi encaminhada corretamente antes de efetuar uma operação, subscrever e efetuar a operação no <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDownProcessed%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDownProcessed%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods are invoked by the main application thread after accurate hit-testing has been performed.
trans-unit.target: Estes métodos são invocados pelo thread principal da aplicação depois de acessos-teste preciso ter sido efetuada.

trans-unit.source: To subscribe to these methods, call the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> method in the method that occurs on the pen thread.
trans-unit.target: Para subscrever destes métodos, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>método no método que ocorre no thread de caneta.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you call <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A> occurs.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se chamar <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>no <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A>, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A>ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you use a StylusPlugIn inside a control, you should test the plug-in and control extensively to make sure they do not throw any unintended exceptions.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se utilizar um StylusPlugIn dentro de um controlo, deve testar o plug-in e controlar extensivamente para se certificar de que inicia quaisquer exceções indesejadas.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This class is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de texto de XAML que esta classe não é normalmente utilizada em XAML.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> is attached.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ao qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"> </xref> está ligado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> is attached.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ao qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"> </xref> está ligado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached bounds of the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os limites em cache do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> caches the bounds of its element to perform hit testing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>atingiu o caches dos limites do respetivo elemento para efetuar testes.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>

trans-unit.source: The cached bounds of the element.
trans-unit.target: Os limites em cache do elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> is active.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"> </xref> está ativa.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de texto de XAML que esta propriedade não é normalmente utilizada em XAML.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> is active; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"> </xref> está ativo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> is able to accept input.
trans-unit.target: Obtém se o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"> </xref> é capaz de aceitar a entrada.

trans-unit.source: The following conditions must be met for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> to accept input: - The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> is a member of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugInCollection>.
trans-unit.target: As condições seguintes têm de ser cumpridas para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>para aceitar a entrada:- <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>é um membro de um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugInCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugInCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Element%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> is visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Element%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>está visível e ativado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Element%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> is able to accept input; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"> </xref> é capaz de aceitar a entrada; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> is added to an element.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"> </xref> é adicionado a um elemento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Enabled*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Enabled*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Enabled*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.IsActiveForInput*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.IsActiveForInput*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.IsActiveForInput*>

trans-unit.source: Use the OnIsActiveForInputChanged method to allocate and clean up resources used by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método de OnIsActiveForInputChanged ao atribuir e limpar os recursos utilizados por <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> is removed from an element.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"> </xref> é removida de um elemento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs on a thread in the pen thread pool when the tablet pen touches the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre num thread no conjunto de threads de caneta quando a caneta tablet tocar o digitizer.

trans-unit.source: This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
trans-unit.target: Por isso, este método ocorre num thread caneta, minimiza o trabalho neste método para evitar a afetar o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"></xref> that contains information about input from the pen.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a entrada de caneta.

trans-unit.source: Occurs on the application UI (user interface) thread when the tablet pen touches the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre no thread de IU (interface de utilizador) de aplicação quando a caneta tablet tocar o digitizer.

trans-unit.source: To subscribe to this method, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para subscrever este método, chame <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>no <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object that the application passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que a aplicação foi transmitida para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen's input was correctly routed to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a caneta de entrada foi encaminhada corretamente para o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs on a pen thread when the cursor enters the bounds of an element.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre num thread caneta quando o cursor introduz os limites de um elemento.

trans-unit.source: This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
trans-unit.target: Por isso, este método ocorre num thread caneta, minimiza o trabalho neste método para evitar a afetar o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"></xref> that contains information about input from the pen.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a entrada de caneta.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen actually entered the bounds of the element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a caneta introduzido, na verdade, os limites do elemento; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs on a pen thread when the cursor leaves the bounds of an element.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre num thread caneta quando o cursor sai dos limites de um elemento.

trans-unit.source: This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
trans-unit.target: Por isso, este método ocorre num thread caneta, minimiza o trabalho neste método para evitar a afetar o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"></xref> that contains information about input from the pen.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a entrada de caneta.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen actually left the bounds of the element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a caneta, na verdade, à esquerda dos limites do elemento; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs on a pen thread when the tablet pen moves on the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre num thread caneta quando a caneta tablet move o digitizer.

trans-unit.source: This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
trans-unit.target: Por isso, este método ocorre num thread caneta, minimiza o trabalho neste método para evitar a afetar o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"></xref> that contains information about input from the pen.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a entrada de caneta.

trans-unit.source: Occurs on the application UI (user interface) thread when the tablet pen moves on the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre no thread de IU (interface de utilizador) de aplicação quando a caneta tablet move o digitizer.

trans-unit.source: To subscribe to this method, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A> method
trans-unit.target: Para subscrever este método, chame <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A>método</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object that the application passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que a aplicação foi transmitida para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen's input was correctly routed to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a caneta de entrada foi encaminhada corretamente para o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs on a pen thread when the user lifts the tablet pen from the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre num thread caneta quando o utilizador lifts a caneta tablet do digitizer.

trans-unit.source: This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
trans-unit.target: Por isso, este método ocorre num thread caneta, minimiza o trabalho neste método para evitar a afetar o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"></xref> that contains information about input from the pen.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a entrada de caneta.

trans-unit.source: Occurs on the application UI (user interface) thread when the user lifts the tablet pen from the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre no thread de IU (interface de utilizador) de aplicação quando o utilizador lifts a caneta tablet do digitizer.

trans-unit.source: To subscribe to this method, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A> method
trans-unit.target: Para subscrever este método, chame <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A>método</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object that the application passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que a aplicação foi transmitida para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen's input was correctly routed to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a caneta de entrada foi encaminhada corretamente para o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
